details: Replaced an outdated library implementation that processes PDFs for long term digital archiving
Modernize applications to use more capable and secure frameworks
Implement solutions for feature requests and bug fixes
Maintain application security and efficacy by keeping software libraries up-to-date
Improved reporting capability for the college with high quality queries and report design
Administrated and developed web applications to expand the capabilities of the college website
Executed migration of legacy COBOL programs into PL/SQL procedures
Spearheaded updating and verifying internal documentation to improve business continuity and longevity
Maintained excellent proficiency of target language, Pashto
Stationed at NSA Georgia where I proof-read reports, copied and delivered intelligence documents in a time-sensitive manner, and provided personnel productivity records

education.degree: Computer Science BS and Mathematics BA
